class dhs.helpers.base.plot_params.PlotParams[source]

Bases: object

font_scalings = {'large': 1.2, 'larger': 1.2, 'medium': 1.0, 'small': 0.833, 'smaller': 0.833, 'x-large': 1.44, 'x-small': 0.694, 'xx-large': 1.728, 'xx-small': 0.579, None: 1.0}
set_rc_params(kind: str, fig_size: tuple) → dict[source]

Define plotting parameters.

This function returns the plotting parameters for different plot styles.

Parameters:

  • kind (str) – Type of figure [fig_small, fig_medium, fig_big].

  • fig_size (tuple) – Figure size.

Returns:

Dictionary with parameters for plotting.

Return type:

dict

dhs.helpers.base.prior_mdls module

class dhs.helpers.base.prior_mdls.PriorMdls(target: Series, noise: float = 1, features=None, conc_rate=None)[source]

Bases: object

create_mdl_bal() → Model[source]

Create a PyMC model using the Bayesian adaptive lasso prior.

This function creates a random intercept model that uses the Bayesian adaptive lasso prior for estimation.

Returns:

Bayesian adaptive lasso PyMC model to be numerically estimated.

Return type:

pm.Model

create_mdl_dhs() → Model[source]

Create a PyMC model using the Dirichlet-horseshoe prior.

This function creates a random intercept model that uses the Dirichlet-horseshoe prior for estimation.

Returns:

Dirichlet-horseshoe PyMC model to be estimated.

Return type:

pm.Model

create_mdl_dl() → Model[source]

Create a PyMC model using the Dirichlet-Laplace prior.

This function creates a random intercept model that uses the Dirichlet-Laplace prior for estimation.

Returns:

Dirichlet-Laplace PyMC model to be estimated.

Return type:

pm.Model

create_mdl_hs() → Model[source]

Create a PyMC model using the horseshoe prior.

This function creates a random intercept model that uses the horseshoe prior for estimation.

Returns:

Horseshoe PyMC model to be estimated.

Return type:

pm.Model

create_mdl_rhs() → Model[source]

Create a PyMC model using the regularized horseshoe prior.

This function creates a random intercept model that uses the regularized horseshoe prior for estimation.

Returns:

Regularized horseshoe PyMC model to be estimated.

Return type:

pm.Model

Create the target prediction variable.

Parameters:

  • icpt (pm.Distribution) – Intercept.
